pageContext.collection_description: The WTJU recorded music collections highlight a wide variety of rock, jazz, folk, world, and and classical music, with a focus on music not typically heard on commercial broadcast stations.  WTJU also houses a largely haphazard variety of station documents, playlists, communications, flyers and other ephemera, and houses a good number of paintings by Steve Keene, a WTJU alum.
pageContext.collection_usage_statement: Station management may decide whether a researcher can access the storage space where text documents are held; station management also controls access to the recordings library for any outside researchers.
